title: Sautéing Simmering Technique -- Ratatouille with a d5 Dutch oven
description: For the Ratatouille's recipe, prepare your summer vegetables into small, evenly sized pieces for uniform cooking. Heat the olive oil with a twig of thyme and rosemary, add all the vegetables. Allow the contents to simmer slowly while stirring gently. Add some finely chopped basil at the last moment in order to give a smooth and subtle flavour. Served with chicken breast cooked in a  dutch oven,  it's delicious.

asset.author: AllCladOfficial

transcripts: Prepare your summer vegetables by washing, drying, cutting, them into small evenly sized pieces for uniform cooking. Heat the olive oil with a 12-time in rosemary at all the vegetables season with salt pepper and then allow the contents to simmer slowly while stirring gently. There is no doubt that the all-clad d5 Soto's is perfectly suited for this type cooking method thanks to its Peyton stainless steel core that provides optimum heat distribution across the entire cooking surface. Add some finely chopped basil at the last moment in order to give this traditional dish it's smooth and subtle flavor serve the ratatouille with chicken breast cooked in a Dutch oven and season with Hawaiian salt and and a trickle of cooking for ratatouille. it's delicious.
